project_descr: The project aims to assist the mainstreaming of the 2030 Agenda at national and local level and acceleration of the progress in tackling obstacles to development.

outputs.output_descr: Capacities of countries to produce data for SDG monitoring and reporting are strengthened
donor_name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade of the Republic of korea

outputs.output_descr: Cutting-edge advocacy tools made available and the effective multi-stakeholders mechanism for implementation and citizen- driven review and follow-up process are established
donor_name: UN DEPT OF ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL AFFAIRS
UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT FUND FOR WOME
Junior Chamber International - Global Leadership of Active Citizens

outputs.output_descr: Agenda 2030 for Sustainable Develoment mainstreamed at national and local levels.
donor_name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade of the Republic of korea

outputs.output_descr: Analytical tools used by policy makers to identify synergies and trade offs in implementation of the SDGs
donor_name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade of the Republic of korea

outputs.output_descr: Countries draw on Expertise and joined up capacities of UN entities to support governments with SDG implementation
donor_name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade of the Republic of korea

outputs.output_descr: Evidence-based knowledge products on issues relevant to SDG implementation developed and shared
donor_name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade of the Republic of korea

outputs.output_descr: A dedicated Strategic Policy team will coordinate the delivery of the project and support the different work streams.
donor_name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade of the Republic of korea
